mapper.select: select roomsId, count(*) reservationCount from reservation where checkOut > current_timestamp and hostId=#{userId} group by roomsId

select re.reservationNum,re.userId,u.userName,u.userPhoto, re.checkIn, re.checkOut,re.price, re.people from reservation re inner JOIN user u on re.userId=u.userId where re.checkOut > current_timestamp and re.roomsId=#{roomsId}

select re.userId, u.userName,u.userPhoto, re.roomsId,re.checkIn,re.checkOut from reservation re LEFT OUTER JOIN evaluation e on re.reservationNum = e.reservationNum inner JOIN user u on re.userId = u.userId where hostId=#{hostId} and e.evaluationContent is null and checkOut < current_timestamp ORDER BY checkOut desc ;

select re.userId, u.userName,u.userPhoto, re.roomsId,re.checkIn,re.checkOut, e.evaluationContent,e.evaluationDate from reservation re inner JOIN evaluation e on re.reservationNum = e.reservationNum inner JOIN user u on re.userId = u.userId where hostId=#{hostId} and e.evaluationContent is not null and checkOut < current_timestamp ORDER BY checkOut desc ;
